Editor. Writer. Communications consultant.

v

I offer professional editing, writing, and strategizing to help academic researchers and organizations harness the power of the written word.

I specialize in editing of economic and environmental research.

 

Featured work:

 “Understanding Happiness,” a policy report for the Centre for Advantage in the Global Economy, discusses ways to rethink traditional aims and definitions of socioeconomic progress.
